commits.message: Add skipConversion param to manual batch/resend/dry-run endpoints
Add SkipValueConversion toggle: Prevention sends raw OD_TR_VAL values
commits.body: - IHisAdapter.SkipValueConversion: default false, Prevention overrides true

commits.message: Fix LIS updateLabNo: add ClinicCode for correct SiteHisMapping FK lookup
commits.body: SiteHisMappingId=0 violated FK constraint. Now LIS sends ClinicCode,

commits.message: Add TheseCloud SOAP adapter (v1.5) and LIS integration API endpoints
commits.body: - TheseCloud adapter: first SOAP-based adapter using WCF Core proxy, 53-column THCLOUD DataTable format

commits.message: Add Vision/Realsun seed scripts and dry-run comparison utilities
Integrate updateLabNo into Prevention adapter (replaces SupPreventionApiDotNetCore)
commits.body: - Add PreventionLabNo model and UpdateLabNoAsync API client method

commits.message: Add real-time failure email alerts, simplify Prevention download, extend log retention
commits.body: - Add SendFailureAlertAsync for immediate email notification on transfer failures

commits.message: Refactor Realsun to FTP upload, fix Group B date fields, add dry-run verification
commits.body: - Realsun: replace HTTP POST with FTP upload + callback API (FluentFTP)
